works.description:
The first two links are to articles that 

contain information on Scottish folklore and a recipes with a picture of  

a 'strùthan' bannock. The third link is a longer article on Scottish  
folklore relating to the same subject. The fourth link contains folklore  

relating to Samhainn/Hallowe'en traditions, which have been reproduced in
a  
slightly edited format, although still obviously from my own article  
without sourcing.

This is the second time I've had to report this blogger, and the third
time  
I've found her infringing my coprighted articles and images. Please see
